name: **NEW** NOVELS - Savior (CD Album) + FREE EP !!!
description: "Savior" is the first album (mastered by Ted Jensen [Deftones, Alice In Chains, Muse, Sigur Ros...] at Sterling Sound Studios, NY) for the french power trio, Novels. It contains 10 tracks of alternative rock with an heavy metal touch. For fans of Deftones, Smashing Pumpkins or Silverchair. 1. Child 2. Like This 3. Where Did U Find Luv? 4. F*** You 5. No Fake Smile 6. Drama 7. Siamese 8. Give In 9. Void 10. Hey Girl Free with this album: the EP "Where Did You Find Love", including 3 exclusive tracks. Digital version of the EP available here: http://yrletter.bandcamp.com/album/where-did-you-find-love 1. Where Did You Find Love 2. No Fake Smile [full lenght version] 3. Rearrange 4. Standstill [Witness cover] www.myspace.com/novelsmusic

name: **NEW** FERGUSON OVERDRIVE - Ass Kicking, Ground Shaking, Love Making, Rock n Roll! (10" EP)
description:
First DIY 10" for the guitar & drums duo from Denmark !
6 tracks for fans of MC5, Led Zeppelin, The Black Box Revelation...
The 10" comes with a download code (with an extra song) !

Digital version available here: http://fergusonoverdrive.bandcamp.com

Side A:
01 Can't leave you alone 3:55
02 Save this place tonight 4:34
03 I got you 3:34

Side B:
04 Gotta go 3:52
05 The big red button 3:58
06 Yeah you got it 4:27

http://www.myspace.com/fergusonoverdrive

name: **NEW** HELSINKI SEVEN - Division (CD EP) + s/t (CD Album)
description:
2 DIY digipak CD by the english band Helsinki Seven !
16 songs for fans of Biffy Clyro, Foo Fighters, Flying Donuts...

Digital version available here:
http://helsinkiseven.bandcamp.com

Divisions (EP):
Mastered by Mike Major (At The Drive In, Sparta...)

1.Via Salarium
2.Pull The Ripcord
3.Crossing The Rubicon
4.In The Company Of Wolves
5.Touch Pause Engage
6.Hey Navigator

s/t (Album):

1.Transmission For The People
2.Waiting For A Hero
3.Brave
4.Calm After The Storm
5.People Without Faces
6.Capitano
7.The Magpie Strikes
8.I'm Spartacus
9.The Trap Is Set
10.Oh Salamander

http://www.myspace.com/helsinkiseven

name: DOWN TO EARTH - Prisms (CD album)
description:
Second album from the trio from La Rochelle, France.
10 tracks recorded by Sylvain Biguet (Parween, Comity, Sheraff...) and mastered in Chicago by Bob Weston (Nirvana, Jawbox, Shellac, The Get Up Kids...).
Digital version available on Deep Elm records:
http://deepelmdigital.com/album/prisms

1/2/3. Prisms
4/5. Contro/Versus
6. Slide
7. Countdown To Highlight
8. Blackwalls
9. Radio Stoned
10. Mirrors

www.myspace.com/dteband
